bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a shi fu 食復 , recurrence because of food, resulting from an inadequate diet consumed immediately after recovery from harm caused by cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 8: 傷寒病後食復候 :, “Signs of a recurrence, because of food, following a disease of harm caused by cold”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fan 飯：寒食飯 … 傷寒食復，用此飯燒研， 米飲服二三錢，效 , “If one consumes cold rice…and if there is a recurrence, because of food, of harm caused by cold, use this type of rice, roast it and grind it. Ingest with two to three qian of the liquid obtained by boiling rice. Effective”.
